name: Air Fryer Apple Crisp with Oatmeal Streusel
author: Yoly
summary: Air fry your apple crisp for a super crispy oatmeal streusel topping and a soft and moist apple center. Top with ice cream or whipped cream and caramel sauce, or eat it straight out of your air fryer.
ingredients: 2 ½ cups peeled, cored, and diced apples
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine apples, brown sugar, butter, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt in a bowl
Toss and stir until apples are coated
Spray 4 individual-sized ramekins with nonstick cooking spray
Divide apple mixture evenly among all 4 ramekins
Cover with foil and air fry until apples are tender, about 20 minutes
Meanwhile, make streusel in the same bowl by combining oats, flour, brown sugar, butter, cinnamon, and salt
Use your hands to combine streusel
Place in the refrigerator until ready to use
Remove ramekins from the air fryer, divide streusel evenly on top of the apples, and air fry, uncovered, until streusel is a golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes
